name: winurl2html
description: Application that replace .url windows files with an .html file with redirect to the original url

scripts.test: snyk auth && snyk test && echo "Error: no test specified"
scripts.ins: ( npm prune --no-progress || npm prune --no-progress --legacy-peer-deps ) && ( npm install --no-progress || npm install --no-progress --legacy-peer-deps )
scripts.upd: npx -y -p npm-check-updates ncu -u && npm run ins
